body_html:
I would recommend setting inter-op to 2, intra-op to 6 and OMP_NUM_THREADS to 6. Then try increasing inter-op to 3 and/or intra-op to 8/10/12. Make sure OMP_NUM_THREADS is set to the same value as intra-op.

If this doesn't work, please post the timeline (or a screenshot of it) listing the top few ops and how long they take. You can find how to create a timeline here: https://towardsdatascience.com/howto-profile-tensorflow-1a49fb18073d
body_text:
I would recommend setting inter-op to 2, intra-op to 6 and OMP_NUM_THREADS to 6. Then try increasing inter-op to 3 and/or intra-op to 8/10/12. Make sure OMP_NUM_THREADS is set to the same value as intra-op.
If this doesn't work, please post the timeline (or a screenshot of it) listing the top few ops and how long they take. You can find how to create a timeline here: https://towardsdatascience.com/howto-profile-tensorflow-1a49fb18073d
body:
I would recommend setting inter-op to 2, intra-op to 6 and OMP_NUM_THREADS to 6. Then try increasing inter-op to 3 and/or intra-op to 8/10/12. Make sure OMP_NUM_THREADS is set to the same value as intra-op.

If this doesn't work, please post the timeline (or a screenshot of it) listing the top few ops and how long they take. You can find how to create a timeline here: https://towardsdatascience.com/howto-profile-tensorflow-1a49fb18073d
